about_the_game:
Features of this Game
  • Expansive World
  • Narrative Rich Immersion
  • Parkour Movement System

What to expect
Sunline is a first-person 3D free-running game that follows the story of Ana, a rebellious and gadgety teen in the utopian art-nouveau architecture of this solarpunk city of Elyria. When a devastating storm threatens the city she loves, she must put her parkour skills to the test as she becomes the only one able to save Elyria. Ana will run, jump, slide and climb their way through the city of Elyria in a race against time to try to save the city while being accompanied by Ezra Ana's trusty companion.

name: Sunline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x64 Based OS
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.5GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960 (AMD RX 470 equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated graphics not recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x64-based OS
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Sunline is a first-person 3D free-running game that follows Ana, a rebellious teen in the solarpunk city of Elyria, as she saves the city from a crushing storm.
